title: Extract lock key generation into helper method
description: Lock key format 'reservation:{$morphClass}:{$modelId}:{$key}' is constructed in two places: extendReservation() line 50 and reservation() line 96. The comment notes this format is critical for database parsing. Extract into getLockKey() method for single source of truth.

title: Extract duration normalization into helper method
description: Duration conversion logic (string/Carbon to seconds) is duplicated in extendReservation() lines 41-47 and reservation() lines 85-91. Extract into a protected normalizeDuration() method to eliminate duplication and provide single source of truth.

title: Extract default duration as class constant
description: The default duration '60' seconds is repeated 5 times in Reservable.php (lines 18, 23, 39, 83, 104). Extract as DEFAULT_RESERVATION_DURATION constant. Also extract DEFAULT_BLOCKING_WAIT_TIME for the '10' second wait default.

title: Add PHPDoc to all public Reservable trait methods
description: All public methods in the Reservable trait lack PHPDoc comments. This creates IDE autocomplete gaps and makes API discovery difficult. Methods needing docs: reserve(), blockingReserve(), reserveWhile(), extendReservation(), releaseReservation(), isReserved(), and all scope methods.

title: Add edge case tests for duration and scope handling
description: Missing edge case test coverage: 1) Negative duration handling, 2) Invalid Carbon string format, 3) Scope chainability (reserved + where), 4) Scope pagination, 5) Polymorphic models with same ID but different types, 6) Competing reservations during blockingReserve timeout.

title: Add tests for ServiceProvider and CacheLock model
description: Missing test coverage for: 1) ReservableServiceProvider - no tests for boot(), config publishing, migration publishing. 2) CacheLock model - no tests for table config, string primary key, timestamp disabling, generated columns. Create tests/ServiceProviderTest.php and tests/CacheLockModelTest.php.

title: Extract config model resolution into helper method
description: Config model resolution 'config("reservable.model", CacheLock::class)' appears twice: extendReservation() line 52 and reservations() line 140. Extract into getCacheLockModel() method for centralized access and easier future validation.

title: Add type hints to CacheLock model properties
description: CacheLock model properties lack type hints: $table, $primaryKey, $incrementing, $keyType, $timestamps, $guarded. PHPStan/Psalm at level 8+ will flag these as implicit mixed types. Add explicit types like 'protected string $table' etc.

title: Delete orphaned migration stub file
description: File database/migrations/add_reservation_columns_to_cache_locks_table.php.stub is not referenced anywhere in the codebase. The actual migrations exist in tests/database/migrations/. Delete if not needed for package distribution, or document its purpose.
